description: The SPEC_DB_MAIN table contains basic information about your specimen records. These include clinical pathology, anatomic pathology, and quality control specimens. One row in this table represents one specimen.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the specimen record

columns.name: SPEC_NUMBER_LN1
columns.description: The main external identifier of the specimen

columns.name: SPEC_DTM_COLLECTED
columns.description: The date and time when the specimen was collected.

columns.name: SPEC_DTM_RECEIVED
columns.description: The date and time when the specimen was received.

columns.name: SPEC_CONTAINER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the container associated with this specimen

columns.name: SPEC_CONTAINER_ID_CONTAINER_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the container type record.

columns.name: SPEC_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The specimen source category for the specimen.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SPEC_EPT_PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the patient whom this specimen belongs to.

columns.name: SPEC_SUB_SPEC_NO
columns.description: The submitter's specimen number.

columns.name: SPEC_DRAW_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The draw type category number for the specimen


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SPEC_REQ_GRP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the requisition grouper associated with this specimen if this is a non-EPT patient

columns.name: REQ_SMT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the submitter of the requisition that this specimen is attached to. This is only populated for reference lab specimens.

columns.name: REQ_SMT_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the submitter record.

columns.name: REQ_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the requisition this specimen is attached to. This is only populated for reference lab specimens.

columns.name: ACUTE_CONVAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The acute/convalescent category number for the specimen record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Acute


Convalescent

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the case this specimen is attached to. This is only populated for anatomic pathology specimens.

columns.name: RECV_QUEUE_COMM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the internal receiving comment that is associated with this specimen.

columns.name: SPEC_COLL_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the specimen was collected in the UTC time zone.

columns.name: SPEC_RCVD_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the specimen was received in the UTC time zone.

columns.name: SPEC_FROZEN_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this specimen is a frozen specimen.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: SPECIMEN_COL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the specimen collection record which is associated with this specimen.

columns.name: AP_RECEIVE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the anatomic pathology specimen was received in the UTC time zone. This is only populated for anatomic pathology specimens.

columns.name: DRAW_SESS_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the draw session this specimen belongs to was started. It is stored in the UTC time zone.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The specimen type category ID for the specimen. This is calculated from the specimen type for the first order on the specimen that has a specimen type set and has not been redrawn or removed. If all orders on the specimen have been redrawn or removed, it is calculated from the specimen type for the first removed order that has a specimen type set.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SPEC_FROM_DSL_YN
columns.description:
Stores whether a specimen was created from the Specimen Linking activity. The default value is No.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SPEC_FROZEN_YN

columns.name: ONSET_DATE
columns.description: The onset date that symptoms began for the associated specimen. This is a legacy item and this data is no longer populated in Chronicles.

columns.name: BIOHAZARD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The biohazard category ID for the specimen. This is legacy data that is no longer populated.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


*

columns.name: DRAW_CHGS_TRGRD_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether draw charges have been triggered for the specimen. 'Y' indicates that a draw charge has been triggered. 'N' or NULL indicate that a draw charge has not been triggered.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SPEC_FROZEN_YN

columns.name: SPEC_SOURCE
columns.description: The specimen source for the specimen. This is legacy data that is no longer populated.

columns.name: SPEC_ORIGIN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The special specimen origin category ID for the specimen.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Import Specs


Interface


Auto-Import

columns.name: IMPORT_RUN_BATCH_NUMBER_ID
columns.description: The batch ID associated to an imported specimen

columns.name: CREATION_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department that the specimen was created in.

columns.name: COLL_PPID_OVRIDE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether PPID was overridden during collection for this specimen.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SPEC_FROZEN_YN

columns.name: COLL_PSID_OVRIDE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether PSID was overridden during collection for this specimen.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SPEC_FROZEN_YN
